remarks.p: This attribute can be used to mark the level of indentation of a post in a thread-like structure (as defined by its author and in relation to the standard level of indentation which should be encoded with 0). This is commonly used for Wiki talk pages, but should also be used for genres such as webblog comments when the source was HTML.
